name: Finance Starter Pack (Bundle: 6 Templates)
description: Get started with Finance x Notion for beginnersA collection 6 ready-to-use templates to kickstart your Notion journey.Why download this?It is always difficult to create something from a blank slate.My Notion templates are extremely easy-to-understand, comes with tutorials and are meant to illustrate what you can quickly build for yourself.Templates includedExpense Tracker - Turn actual expense data into your personalized budget to prevent over-spendingSubscription Tracker - Start saving money to
features: Expense Tracker- Turn actual expense data into your personalized budget to prevent over-spending; Subscription Tracker- Start saving money today by cancelling under-utilized services; Insurance Tracker- Know exactly how much insurance coverage you have and how much you're paying for it; Debt Tracker- Take control of your debt and manage monthly outflows; Air Miles Tracker- Turn daily expenses into business class flights; Travel Budget Planner- Know exactly how much you need for your stress-free dream vacation; Notion templates; Tutorial guide on how to use the templates; Sample entries included to demonstrate usage; Lifetime access and updates
